Detailed Description

Logging and assertion functions used by BaseTen.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum BXLogLevel

Logging levels used by BaseTen.

Enumerator
kBXLogLevelOff 

No logging

kBXLogLevelFatal 

Fatal errors

kBXLogLevelError 

Errors

kBXLogLevelWarning 

Warnings

kBXLogLevelInfo 

Information

kBXLogLevelDebug 

Debugging information

Function Documentation

BX_EXPORT void BXAssertionDebug ( )

A debugging helper.

This function provides a convenient breakpoint. It will be called when an assertion fails. The reason might be a bug in either BaseTen or in user code.

BX_EXPORT void BXDeprecationWarning ( )

A debugging helper.

This function provides a convenient breakpoint. It will be called when deprecated functionality is invoked, presently when relationships with deprecated names are used.

BX_EXPORT void BXLogSetAbortsOnAssertionFailure ( BOOL  )

Set whether the logger should call abort() on assertion failure.

Warning
This function is not thread-safe.
BX_EXPORT void BXLogSetLevel ( enum BXLogLevel  level)

Set the logging level.

Warning
This function is not thread-safe.
